name: Mushroom or Fairy House?
description: When you were younger did you ever play the game Mushroom or Fairy House? I certainly did! These adorable mushrooms are worked in-the-round on dpns. They are knit in one piece, which makes finishing a breeze; simply add a touch of embroidery for the spots, doors and windows (how to videos included).
sizes_available: Diameter & Height: Approximately 3"/ 7.5cm, or desired size.
suggested_yarn: Patons North America Classic Wool Worsted
full_text: When you were younger did you ever play the game Mushroom or Fairy House? I certainly did! These adorable mushrooms are worked in-the-round on dpns. They are knit in one piece, which makes finishing a breeze; simply add a touch of embroidery for the spots, doors and windows (how to videos included). I hope you enjoy this free pattern. Happy Knitting! Natasha Praise for Mushroom or Fairy House “Pattern was perfect.” ( Gigiginny ) “Fun, fun, fun!” (thrsedge) “Easy, fun and really quick!” (MinniStitcher) “Made a bunch! So cute!” (deannadarling) “Pattern quick, fun and well written” (bonewoman) “Brilliantly Written. Clear Words & Photos.” (RandyRatCrafts) The pattern is wonderful—so well-written, and I loved the photos provided! ( mallacrochet ) This is so cute. ( 5kittens ) Cute & quick pattern! ( kayrun )
